title: chat
body:
Every time in champ select or before champion select,  i have no chat interface.  

"reconnecting to chat "  but never connects...
how can i solve this issue?

replies.body: i still havent even received a response,  extremely frustrated....

Same issue. Two days now, login, and immediately I have reconnecting to chat and even after a couple games it still has the same message.

No chat pre game, champ select, or post game. Only in game. Help.

Hi Blinkfenix!

Chat issues specifically in Champion Selection is incredibly unusual O.o However, if you experience this error in the client as well, it may indicate an issue with your computer connecting to our Chat Servers.

In an effort to try and get a fix for this, make sure that you try the following:

Go to:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\[Highest Release Version NUmber]\deploy\preferences

Once here, find your SummonerName.properties files (for example, dArtagnan.properties) and delete it.

Next, open the "global" folder and open the "global.properties" file in notepad. Clear the contents of this file but **DO NOT** delete this file, if you do it will not be recreated. Just delete all of the content in the file then save it.

If the issue still persists, make sure to reply back and let me know!
issue still persists  during champ select and before it on the home screen (e.t.c) but not in game. chat is unavailable  but says " connecting/reconnecting to chat services "

It doesn't seem like this is an issue with local files on your computer then.  The most likely reason is that your computer cannot successfully connect to our Chat Servers.  Given this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues KB](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) -- they should be able to help get you to connect successfully.

If your still unable to connect to chat whatsoever, make sure to [submit us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  This way, one of our Tech Specialists can work with you one-on-one in order to get this issue resolved.  If you do submit a ticket, include the following:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
